701247f-b.text:
Henry Hudson Parkway, north from West 252nd Street, showing the bridge spanning the Parkway at about West 253rd Street. The road turns eastward, beyond the bridge, towards Broadway.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A closer view of the bridge.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

701712f-a.text:
Riverdale Ave., at the S.E. corner of West 252nd Street, showing the Christ Protestant Episcopal Church. In the foreground is the Henry Hudson Parkway, under construction.
April 24, 1937.
P.L. Sperr.
